episodes.title: 7. Ex-Scientology Propaganda Chief Mitch Brisker
episodes.description: Former chief architect of Scientology's global propaganda machine, Mitch Brisker joins to talk about his new book Scientology The Big Lie: How I Made an Evil Cult Look Good . You can support Redacted Island by signing up for the Patreon: Patreon.com/redactedisland Learn more about Mitch Brisker's work: Scientologythebiglie.com Youtube.com/@Scientology-The-Big-Lie Facebook: facebook.com/mitchbrisker IG: instagram.com/mitchbrisker Get bonus content on Patreon Hosted on Acast.
